fields.title: Funko Pop! Dragon Ball Z - Super Saiyan Gohan #509
fields.description: This Pop! Vinyl features Gohan in his Super Saiyan form! An absolute MUST for any true Dragon Ball collection! These won't last long, so order now!
fields.alt_text: Toy model of an anime ninja character

fields.title: Funko POP! Jedi: Fallen Order - Merrin (Nightsister) #553
fields.description: This Pop! features Merrin from 2019's smash-hit release Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. Merrin a Dathomirian Nightsister who lived on her homeworld of Dathomir furing the Imperial Era, She was also a survivor of General Grievous' massacre on the Nightsisters during the Clone Wars.
fields.alt_text: Toy model of a Star Wars jedi

fields.title: Funko Pop! Pokemon - Mewtwo #581
fields.description: This Pop! features Mewtwo, a Pokémon created by science, not known to evolve into or from any other Pokémon.
fields.alt_text: Toy model of a pink pokemon character named Mew

fields.title: Funko Pop! Pokemon - Glaceon Flocked #921
fields.alt_text: Toy model of a blue pokemon character named Glaceon
fields.description: Glaceon is an Ice-type Pokemon introduced in Generation IV. Finished with a unique flocked texture, the adorable Glaceon simply can't wait to join your Pokemon Pop! collection!

fields.title: Funko Pop! The Flash (2023) - Batman Diamond Glitter #1342
fields.description: You won't want to miss out on this awesome The Flash (2023) - Batman Diamond Glitter Pop! Vinyl Figure.
fields.alt_text: Toy model of batman with silver glitter

fields.title: Funko Pop! Sonic the Hedgehog - Sonic with Chaos Emerald #284
fields.description: Straight from the Green Hill Zone comes Funko's new Sonic the Hedgehog Pop! Vinyl Figures ready to speed their way into your Funko collection!
fields.alt_text: Toy model of sonic the hedgehog

fields.title: Funko Pop! Star Wars - R2-D2 (Facet) Disney 100th #593
fields.description: The loyal droid R2-D2 from Star Wars joins some of the most iconic characters of the Disney universe to be given new faceted treatment, complete with a pearlescent finish that captures the light from any angle! Don't miss adding this Funko Exclusive release to your Star Wars collection!
fields.alt_text: Toy model of R2D2 from star wars

fields.title: Funko Pop! Black Panther (2018) - Black Panther (Facet) Disney 100th #1187
fields.description: Defend humanity and celebrate Disney's 100th Anniversary with the new Faceted Black Panther Pop! from Funko! This iconic Avengers' vibranium mantle has been upgraded in this Funko Exclusive variant to a faceted suit, complete with a metallic finish that captures the light from any angle!
fields.alt_text: Toy model of the character Blank Panther

fields.title: Funko Pop! Daredevil - Punisher #216
fields.description: The Punisher is a vigilante who aims to clean up Hell's Kitchen by any means necessary, no matter how lethal the results.
fields.alt_text: Toy model of a character Daredevil from Marvel

fields.title: Funko Pop! Fortnite - Meowscles #639
fields.description: Funko's new wave of Fortnite Pop! Vinyl Figures features a range of epic player skins available in the game including TNTina, Meowscles, Eternal Voyager and Midas, who also comes with a Metallic finish!
fields.alt_text: Tpoy model of a cat character from Fortnite

fields.title: McFarlane Toys DC The Flash Movie Batman (Ben Affleck) Action Figure
fields.description: 18 cm tall, Each figure is fully articulated, Multiple accessories included, Officially-licensed DC Comics action figure, Window box packaging
fields.alt_text: Action figure of Batman

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Warhammer 40k Darktide Traitor Guard Action Figure
fields.description: 18 cm tall, Multiple points of articulation, Different weapon accessories included, Features a stylised display base, Window box collector packaging.
fields.alt_text: Action figure of a guard character from Warhammer

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Batman v Superman DC Films Premium Superman Action Figure
fields.description: DC Collectibles introduces a new line of premium action figures inspired by the world's greatest heroes appearances on the silver screen! 6 in or 15 cm, Made by McFarlane Toys under the DC Collectibles banner, released in 2016, Officially licensed DC Comics action figure
fields.alt_text: Action figure of Superman

fields.title: McFarlane Toys The Joker (The Dark Knight Trilogy)
fields.description: Incredibly detailed 7” scale figure based off The Dark Knight Trilogy. Designed with Ultra Articulation with up to 22 moving parts for full range of posing and play. The Joker comes with a stack of cash, Bane build-a figure hands, head and base. Included collectible art card with character art on the front, and character biography on the back
fields.alt_text: Action figure of The Joker from Batman

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Giyu Tomioka Action Figure
fields.description: Fun pint sized 5 inch scale toy based on the Anime Demon Slayer, Designed with articulation for standard action figure movement, Giyu is based on his look from Demon Slayer season 1, Giyu includes a sword, Figure is showcased in Demon Slayer themed blister card packaging
fields.alt_text: Toy model of a Japanese anime character in school clothes

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Alduin (GOLD) Action Figure
fields.description: Alduin, the World Eater is a dragon and the primary antagonist of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim's Main Quest. He is considered the “wellspring” of the Nordic pantheon, as well as the harbinger of the apocalypse. Includes highly detailed dragon burial mound themed base and flight stand, Wings span wide at 15” and feature up and down movement, Alduin measures 9”H x 15”W x 10” D when fully displayed on elevated base.
fields.alt_text: Model of a gold dragon from Skyrim

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Final Battle (Avatar The Last Airbender) 4-Pack Figures
fields.description: Final Battle Pack Includes: Aang: Along his journey, Aang mastered waterbending, earthbending, and firebending, becoming a fully realized Avatar. With the Fire Nation on the brink of global domination, Aang faced Fire Lord Ozai in a life-or-death battle, emerging victorious. And thanks to the help of his friends, he ended the war and restored balance to the world.
fields.alt_text: A box of toy figures of characters from the anime Avatar: The Last Airbender

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Syrax/Caraxes (House of the Dragon) Bundle (2) Figures
fields.description: Double Pack of figures, featuring Syrax and Caraxes from the HBO show House of The Dragon. Includes House of the Dragon sculpted base. Dragon comes with large attachable wings. Figure is showcased in House of the Dragon window box packaging.
fields.alt_text: Models of 2 dragons, one red, one gold, from the show House of the Dragon

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Geralt of Rivia in Witcher Mode (The Witcher - Netflix S2)
fields.description: Incredibly detailed 7 inch scale figure based off The Witcher on Netflix. Includes Geralt's silver sword and a base. Figure features Geralt in his Season 2 armor with his face pale and white from drinking potions creating the iconic 'toxic' look known in the series as 'Witcher Mode'.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of the character Geralt from The Witcher

fields.title: McFarlane Toys Endeavor (My Hero Academia)
fields.description: Fun pint sized 5 inch scale toy based on the Anime My Hero Academia. Designed with articulation for standard action figure movement. Endeavor is featured in his Season 4 Hero Outfit with transparent flames to mimic his iconic look. Figure is showcased in My Hero Academia themed blister card packaging.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of a character from the anime My Hero Academia

fields.title: Dungeons & Dragons Honor Among Thieves Golden Archive Edgin
fields.description: OPEN THE DOORS TO THE GOLDEN ARCHIVE. This 6-inch scale, premium Edgin action figure is part of the action figures and collectibles inspired by Dungeons & Dragons lore and entertainment from nearly 50 years.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of a human male character from Dungeons and Dragons

fields.title: Ghostbusters Fright Feature Stay Puft Marshmallow Man Ghost Figure with Fright Feature
fields.description: From retro action figures to premium collectibles inspired by new entertainment, gooey ecto-plasm to figures and playsets, Ghostbusters toys from Hasbro are a spooktacular treat for kids and fans of all ages! Ghostbusters Fright Features scare up a button-activated spooky surprise.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of the Marshmallow Man from Ghostbusters

fields.title: Power Rangers Lightning Collection Mighty Morphin Yellow Ranger Power Daggers Roleplay
fields.description: These Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Lightning Collection Premium Roleplay Yellow Ranger Power Daggers have show-inspired design and deco, come with a cool stand for display, and includes awesome electronics that light up the blades and produce sound effects. IT'S MORPHIN TIME!
fields.alt_text: 2 yellow and silver toy daggers

fields.title: Star Wars The Child Animatronic Edition, The Mandalorian Toy
fields.description: The Child Animatronic Edition with sounds and motorized sequences! He may look like “Baby Yoda,” but this lovable creature is called The Child -- and now you can become his protector with this animatronic toy from Star Wars.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of the character The Child from Star Wars

fields.title: Star Wars The Black Series Darth Revan Force FX Elite Lightsaber
fields.description: In the Star Wars lore, Darth Revan's journey from Sith to Jedi is evidenced by the color of his lightsaber blade! As a Sith Lord Revan wields the familiar red-bladed lightsaber, but as a redeemed Jedi Knight he brandishes a lightsaber with a purple blade! Fans can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars lore with lightsabers from The Black Series.
fields.alt_text: A lifesize lightsaber toy

fields.title: Star Wars The Black Series Boba Fett Premium Electronic Helmet
fields.description: Commemorate Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back with The Black Series Boba Fett Premium Electronic Helmet! This roleplay item with premium deco, realistic detail, and movie-inspired design is a great addition to any Star Wars fan's collection.
fields.alt_text: A helmet of Boba Fett from Star Wars

fields.title: Marvel Legends Series Star-Lord Premium Electronic Roleplay Helmet
fields.description: Marvel Legends proudly presents this 1:1 scale reproduction of Star-Lord's helmet as it appears throughout the Marvel Cinematic Universe. With movie-accurate sculpting and detailing across the helmet, this is the next essential Marvel Legends Roleplay item for your Marvel gear collection.
fields.alt_text: A helmet of Star Lord from Guardians of the Galaxy

fields.title: Marvel Legends Series Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (Part One) Miles Morales
fields.description: 6 inch figure of Miles Morales. He faces a new villain with abilities that will take more than one Spider-Man to defeat. The Marvel Legends Series offers elite character-inspired product for Marvel fans and collectors.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of spiderman

fields.title: Transformers: Power Charge Bumblebee Action Figure
fields.description: Spin the core in the action figure's chest to amp up lights and phrases. Then convert to classic yellow Volkswagen Beetle toy car mode in 17 steps and rev the car to hear awesome sound effects.
fields.alt_text: A toy figure of the character Bumblebee from Transformers

fields.title: Jessie, Cloud, and Motorcycle
fields.description: Jessie, a member of the anti-Shinra organization Avalanche from Final Fantasy VII Remake, the motorcycle from the bike chase mini-game, along with protagonist Cloud Strife, joins the fray as a PLAY ARTS KAI action figure Box Size: Height: 22.9 cm, Width: 39.4cm, Depth: 65.4 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of 2 characters on a moterbike

fields.title: Resident: Evil - Leon Kennedy
fields.description: The artisans of Darkside Collectibles Studio with an unparallel quality in art, engineering, and craftsmanship proudly present Leon Kennedy Premium statue, based on the legendary video game Resident Evil 4. Leon is presented combat-ready in his classic casual outfit wearing his iconic leather jacket. His costume features highly detailed accessories sculpted to the finest detail. Box Size: Height: 24.8 cm, Width: 57.1 cm, Depth: 62.9 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of the character Leon from Resident Evil games

fields.title: Aassassin's Creed - RIP Alatair
fields.description: Ezio Auditore entered the Library of Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad expecting to find books. Instead came face to face with the remains of Altaïr himself, seated in a chair and holding a Memory Seal in his hand. Kneeling before Altair to pay his respects, we've captured the pivotal moment when Ezio discovers his life's purpose! Box Size: Height: 24.8 cm, Width: 57.1 cm, Depth: 62.9 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of one man kneeling in front of a skeleton in a chair - from Assassin's Creed

fields.title: Spider Man - Carnage
fields.description: The polystone Carnage Premium Format Figure is fully sculpted in the likeness of the character's iconic Marvel Comics appearance. His matte red physique is detailed with swirling symbiote and sinews to create his signature flayed appearance while black, glossy tendrils of the alien substance form additional clawed weapons at Carnage's disposal. His portrait has white eyes and black fangs, capturing the maniacal excitement of Cletus Kasady uncaged. Pair Carnage in your collection with any range of Spider-Man collectibles or Venom collectibles for an epic symbiote showdown on your shelf. Box Size: Height: 40.6 cm, Width: 52.1 cm, Depth: 63.5 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of the character Carnage from Spiderman comics

fields.title: X-Men - Storm
fields.description: The Storm Premium Format Figure measures 23” tall, depicting Ororo Munroe in the center of her own powerful tempest, inspired by her iconic 90s era Marvel Comics appearance. Held aloft by the blue-tinted vortex base, Storm commands the elements in an impressive display of power, her arms open wide and her white hair flowing dramatically in the wind. Box Size: Height: 32.4 cm, Width: 66.9 cm, Depth: 77.5 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of the charatcer Storm from the X-Men comics

fields.title: Batman - Batmobile
fields.description: The Batmobile is on its way to fight crime in Gotham City! As one of the iconic bat gadgets, the technologically advanced Batmobile is a heavily armored tactical assault vehicle in Batman's arsenal. Based on Christopher Nolan's The Dark Knight trilogy, Sideshow and Hot Toys present the super-vehicle Batmobile as a stunning sixth scale collectible vehicle that can be paired with a Batman figure to recreate more breathtaking scenes! Box Size: Height: 33.7 cm, Width: 57.1 cm, Depth: 82.5 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of the Batmobile car from Batman

fields.title: Lord of the Rings - Legolas (Ultimate Edition)
fields.description: The first half scale with full-body statue of “The Lord of the Rings,” the elf prince Legolas is coming. The Legolas (Ultimate Edition) Statue belongs to the 1/2 Scale Master Forge Series, where Infinity Studios and Penguin Toys adopted the iconic character to a half-scale but with a full body of exquisite details delicately and lovingly restored, giving this item the ultimate presence. Box Size: Height: 104 cm, Width: 49 cm, Depth: 51 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of the character Legolas from The Lord of the Rings

fields.title: Lord of the Rings - Nazgûl
fields.description: In the Lord of the Rings series, the Nazgûl, also known as the Ringwraiths, are a group of nine ring-servants of the Dark Lord Sauron. They were originally human kings, warriors, and sorcerers full of wisdom and power. However, they were tempted by the ring and turned into ghosts manipulated by Sauron after their bodies dissipated. Box Size: Height: 147 cm, Width: 72 cm, Depth: 64 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of 4 shadow characters from Lord of the Rings, named Nazgul

fields.title: Lord of the Rings - Gandalf The White
fields.description: Sideshow and Asmus Toys are proud to present the Gandalf the White Sixth Scale Figure! The most famous wizard joins Asmus Toys' The Crown Series. Go on a journey with Gandalf the White today! Box Size: Height: 24.1 cm, Width: 42.3 cm, Depth: 45.7 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of the character Gandalf from Lord of the Rings

fields.title: Back to the Future - Marty and Doc at the Clock
fields.description: The young Marty McFly and his best friend, Doctor Emmett 'Doc' Brown, formally dressed in 19th-century attire, pose for a photo during the Grand Clock Tower Opening Party in Hill Valley in 1885. Box Size: Height: 27.9 cm, Width: 25.3 cm, Depth: 43.7 cm
fields.alt_text: A figure of 2 characters from Back to the Future, standing in front of a giant clock face

fields.title: Pokemon - Pokéball
fields.description: This premium quality, highly accurate Poké Ball replica, made with an engineered metal shell, has a deeply colored surface that is sensitive to touch and proximity. With its brightly illuminated button and lift-to-display illuminated presentation case, this Poké Ball promises to be a beautiful addition to any Pokémon collection. Box Size: Height: 12.1 cm, Width: 12.1 cm, Depth: 22.9 cm
fields.alt_text: A black and white pokeball

fields.title: The Witcher 3 - Wild Hunt Bookends
fields.description: This set of two polyresin bookends are inspired by the architecture of Kaer Morhen, the now ruined keep where witchers of the School of the Wolf were trained, as seen in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. Now is your opportunity to both show respect to these hallowed grounds and proudly display your Witcher tomes you've acquired through your journey. Format: Each bookend is 8 inches tall, 7 inches wide, and 5.25 inches deep
fields.alt_text: A set of bokends in the shape or steon walls

fields.title: The Witcher 3 - Wild Hunt: Geralt In The Bath Statuette
fields.description: Originally an in-game scene, turned internet meme, turned CD Projekt Red April Fools joke, the demand that this brought to life from Witcher fans became too great to bear. Dark Horse is proud to bring you this marvelously detailed, 8 inches L x 3.5 inches H x 5.5 inches W, hand-painted polyresin statuette featuring Geralt of Rivia relaxing and healing from his perilous journeys, in a candlelit bath, complete with his rubber ducky!
fields.alt_text: A figure of the a male character called Geralt in a bath

fields.title: Dragon Age: Cassandra Statuette
fields.description: Dark Horse Direct and BioWare are proud to continue our exclusive line of Dragon Age collectible statuettes with Cassandra! A member of the Seekers of Truth and companion to the Inquisitor, Cassandra stands prepared to protect the innocent people of Thedas. Posed with sword in hand at 7.5-inches tall on an 3.5-inch wide base, the pious Seeker emanates justice and morality.
fields.alt_text: A figure of a woman warrior holding a sword

fields.title: Dragon Age: Solas Statuette
fields.description: Dark Horse Direct and BioWare are back with the next character in our collection of exclusive Dragon Age Statuettes, Solas! Valuing wisdom and solitude, the elven mage comes to life in this incredibly detailed statuette. Taking a defensive stance at 7.5-inches tall on an 5.75-inch base with a wolf head relief, Solas wields his staff, ready to manipulate rifts in the Veil through his unique knowledge of the Fade.
fields.alt_text: A figure of a male elf holding a staff

fields.title: Assassin's Creed: 15th Anniversary Ultimate Edition HC
fields.description: A sleek 240-page Ultimate Edition hardcover artbook with gold gilded pages and satin ribbon marker, a luxurious folio containing two gallery-quality lithograph prints, and an exclusive metal art plate come packaged together in an exclusive gold foil stamped clamshell case with an embedded double-sided gold coin, featuring the Brotherhood's anniversary crest and the ancient Apple of Eden. This is the ultimate hardcover edition for any Assassin's Creed devotee. Highly limited to just 1000 units, don't be left out of this history making edition and pre-order today!
fields.alt_text: A black bound book with gold inlay

fields.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Samurai Appa Vs Ronin Momo Statue
fields.description: Dark Horse Direct and Nickelodeon are back in action with an all-new statue depicting one of the most memorable moments from the Avatar: The Last Airbender series! The Samurai Appa vs Ronin Momo Statue is a must-have for any fan of these beloved characters. Bringing to life the iconic, sleep deprivation induced battle between Aang's two faithful animal companions, this statue is 10.2-inches wide and 8.7-inches tall.
fields.alt_text: A figure of 2 animal characters from the anime Avatar: The Last Airbender

fields.title: The Legend Of Zelda: Majora's Mask - Majora's Mask 12” PVC Statue Collectors Edition
fields.description: The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask - Majora's Mask PVC statue Collectors Edition. The Collector's Edition also has two LED modes for the eyes: static and pulsing. What sets this PVC apart, however, is the ability to switch between these two modes through motion sensor! And, speaking of LED, the base for the Collector's Edition also has two LED modes: static, which emits white light, and animated, which cycles through five different colors (white, red, yellow, blue, and green).
fields.alt_text: A colourful mask figure

fields.title: The Evil Dead: Ash Statue
fields.description: Dark Horse Direct and Renaissance Pictures have teamed up and are proud to introduce one of horror's most iconic characters, Ash, from The Evil Dead! Poised atop the cellar door keeping his beloved sister, Cheryl, at bay, Ash wields a trusty axe ready to fend off any oncoming deadites. With Ash keeping his eyes peeled for danger, this statue stands at 13 inches tall to the tip of the axe, with a base measurement of 7.25 inches by 6 inches. Relive one of the most legendary horror films with this The Evil Dead: Ash Statue!
fields.alt_text: A figure of the character Ash from the Evil Dead movies

fields.title: The Dragon Prince: Ezran Statuette
fields.description: The Dragon Prince is back! In celebration of the Emmy Award-winning series' highly anticipated return to Netflix, Dark Horse Direct and Wonderstorm are excited to bring you this exclusive Ezran statuette. Ezran stands 5.75 inches tall on a 4.5 inch-wide stone-like base engraved with symbols of the six primal sources of magic. With his two most prized possessions in hand—the grumpy glow toad, Bait, and a perfectly-baked jelly tart—the crown prince of Katolis eagerly awaits his next adventure.
fields.alt_text: A figure of an anime character named The Dragon Prince

fields.title: Stranger Things: Into The Fire #1 Exclusive Variant Comic Bundle
fields.description: Jump into the flames with this red-hot exclusive Stranger Things: Into the Fire #1 by the incredible Bella Grace. A limited-edition of 300 units, don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to dive deeper into the Stranger Things universe and display your love for the Hawkins crew in your home or office. Also included with this rare variant will be a FREE 11 inch by 14 inch Giclée Fine Art Print of the exclusive art taking you deep into the mind-bending depths of the upside-down.
fields.alt_text: A comic book about Stranger Things

fields.title: Dark Souls III: Yhorm 1/12
fields.description: We are proud to present our limited masterpiece of Yhorm the Giant from Dark Souls III. This Colossal boss, also known as the Lord of Cinder, is recognizable by his enormous size, heavy machete, and glowing red eyes and skin. We wanted to represent Yhorm with his most iconic pose when he is sitting on his impressive throne. The big extra plus of this larger version is that the eyes, parts of Yhorm's skin and base can light up and glow thanks to LED devices that bring a whole new dimension to this masterpiece.
fields.alt_text: A figure of a monster chracter from The Dark Souls game

fields.title: Tekken 7: Devil Jin 1/4 Statue
fields.description: BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc. and Pure Arts are proud to pay tribute to Devil Jin, the powerful demon from the fighting game TEKKEN 7. Devil Jin is a legendary character in the TEKKEN series and is known for his extreme arrogance, brooding and aggressive demeanor. The statue itself is a massive 1/4 scale masterpiece statue of Devil Jin spreading his demonic wings and features all the high-details of the characters with an LED system that light-up his eyes, laser beam on his forehead and base.
fields.alt_text: A figure of a character from the Tekken games

fields.title: Terminator 2: Battle Damaged T-800 Art Mask Exclusive Edition
fields.description: This T-800 collectible is specially crafted based on the sculpt of the previous T-800 Art Mask edition and features an authentic and detailed battle scarred Endoskull, torn from a Model 101. This Limited Edition collectible is cast in sturdy polyresin, and shows a ravaged T-800, including an LED system, lighting the eyes of the cyborg and giving a scored burning steel effect to the Endoskeleton and base.
fields.alt_text: A replica figure of the Terminator burnt mask

fields.title: Dark Souls III: Pontiff Sulyvahn 1/7 Scale Statue Deluxe Edition
fields.description: The Greatsword of Judgement shows dark blue hues, deeper than the darkest moon, reflecting sorcerer Sulyvahn's true nature, and the Profaned Greatsword on his right hand bursts into flames, reflecting his burning ambition rooted deep within him. The Deluxe Edition features Pontiff Sulyvahn's immense Shadow Clone summoned behind him, also light-powered, referring to his iconic battle in Dark Souls III.
fields.alt_text: A monster figure from the Dark Souls games

fields.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Johnny Silverhand 1/4 Scale Statue
fields.description: PureArts Studio is extremely excited to present our 1/4 scale replica of Johnny Silverhand, crafted based on the appearance of the iconic character from the trending video game, Cyberpunk 2077. Johnny, a central character in the game, is also known as a Rockerboy and the lead singer of the band Samurai.
fields.alt_text: A figure of the Character Johnny Silverhand from the game Cyberpunk

fields.title: Demon Souls: Kyojuro Rengoku
fields.description: The user of Flame Breathing, Kyojuro Rengoku, will be released by Kotobukiya as a 1/8 scale figure! From the anime, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, the Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, comes to life as he strikes down his sword in a dynamic attack. The sculpt of the billowing haori that he wears seems to be alive with motion as much care was put into the flutter of fabric for each flame on the haori's hem. Coupled with the sculpted flames on the base, this is an item filled with burning intensity.
fields.alt_text: A figure of an anime character shrouded in flames

fields.title: Demon Souls: Nichirin Sword (Tengen Uzui)
fields.description: From 'Kimetsu no Yaiba: Demon Slayer' Tengen Uzui's Nichirin Swords joins the Proplica series. Twin blades, double the action, and excitement brought to life with Proplica quality and attention to detail.
fields.alt_text: A figure of 2 ornage swords on a stand

fields.title: My Hero Academia: Izuku Midoriya
fields.description: Presenting a gigantic 1:4 scale figure of Izuku Midoriya! From the popular anime series My Hero Academia comes a 1:4 scale figure of the main character Izuku Midoriya, also known as 'Deku'! He's been faithfully captured in figure form in a dynamic action pose that looks impressive from any angle. The figure is 1:4 scale and approximately 34.8cm in height. Be sure to add him to your collection!
fields.alt_text: A figure of an anime character standing in waves

fields.title: One Piece: Black Maria (Glitter Of Ha)
fields.description: Sideshow and Bandai Spirits Ichibansho is proud to announce the Black Maria (Glitter of Ha) Collectible Figure! This statue is expertly crafted and meticulously sculpted to look like Ulti from their respective anime. Standing at approximately 6.3 inches tall, Yamato is seen in their popular pose. Be sure to collect this and enhance your display with other incredible Ichibansho figures!
fields.alt_text: A figure of a female anime character in a Japanese Kimono

fields.title: My Hero Academia: Katsuki Bakugo
fields.description: Presenting a gigantic 1:4 scale figure of Katsuki Bakugo! From the popular anime series 'My Hero Academia' comes a 1:4 scale figure of the main character Deku's childhood friend and rival, Katsuki Bakugo! He's been faithfully captured in an intense action pose in the moment before unleashing an attack.
fields.alt_text: A figure of an anime character posing to run

fields.title: One Piece: Luffy Taro 'Warriors Alliance'
fields.description: Sideshow and MegaHouse are excited to present the Luffy Taro 'Warriors Alliance' Collectible Figure! Luffy joins the Warriors Alliance line from MegaHouse, nicknamed 'Luffy Taro'! Dressed in a ronin-inspired outfit, this figure stands about 6.7 inches tall, posed to fight his opponents. Don't miss your chance to add this figure to your One Piece collection today!
fields.alt_text: A figure of an anime ninja character holding a sword

fields.title: The Mandalorian And The Child (Deluxe)
fields.description: Crafted based on the appearance of The Child in The Mandalorian, the sixth scale scale Grogu collectible features a curious standing Child with delicate workmanship, and a signature necklace. This Deluxe Version brings an additional The Child sitting in the hover pram, beskar steel and camtono container with LED light-up function, a whistling bird firing effects attachable to Mandalorian's left gauntlet, and also a miniature hologram exclusively to recreate more iconic scenes!
fields.alt_text: A figure of the Mandolorian character and the Child character

fields.title: Boba Fett & Fennec Shand On Throne Deluxe
fields.description: Sideshow and Iron Studios are proud to announce the latest from the Art Scale 1:10 line - Boba Fett & Fennec Shand on Throne Deluxe! This Star Wars Collectible Art Scale Statue is limited edition and comes with a detailed hand-painted base.
fields.alt_text: A figure of 2 characters from Star Wars sitting on a throne

fields.title: Pokemon - Great Ball
fields.description: This premium quality, highly accurate Great Ball Replica is made with an engineered metal shell and has a deeply colored surface that is sensitive to touch and proximity and features a brightly illuminated button and lift-to-display illuminated presentation case. This Great Ball promises to be a beautiful addition to any Pokémon collection! Box Size: Height: 12.1 cm, Width: 12.1 cm, Depth: 22.9 cm
fields.alt_text: A blue and white pokeball

fields.title: Pokemon - Ultra Ball
fields.description: This premium quality, highly accurate Ultra Ball replica is made with an engineered metal shell, has a deeply colored surface that is sensitive to touch and proximity and features a brightly illuminated button and lift-to-display illuminated presentation case.  This Ultra Ball promises to be a beautiful addition to any Pokémon collection! Box Size: Height: 12.1 cm, Width: 12.1 cm, Depth: 22.9 cm
fields.alt_text: A black pokeball
